remarks: Lemma for ~ dia2dim .  Show that the composition (sum) of translations (vectors) ` G ` and ` D ` equals ` F ` .  Part of proof of Lemma M in [Crawley] p. 121 line 5.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dia2dimlem4.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem4.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem4.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem4.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem4.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dia2dimlem4.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem4.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. T ) $.
dia2dimlem4.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. T ) $.
dia2dimlem4.gv $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` P ) = Q ) $.
dia2dimlem4.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. T ) $.
dia2dimlem4.dv $e |- ( ph -> ( D ` Q ) = ( F ` P ) ) $.
dia2dimlem4 $p |- ( ph -> ( D o. G ) = F ) $.
